proposal.fictionalClientDescription: Green Horizons Landscapes Ltd. is a fast-growing landscape design and environmental consultancy based in Edinburgh, serving both commercial and residential clients across Scotland. With a focus on sustainable outdoor spaces, they are recognised for their innovative, eco-friendly projects and community engagement.
proposal.coverHeadline: Distinctive Branding for Scotland’s Sustainable Landscape Leaders
proposal.coverSubheadline: A tailored design partnership to elevate Green Horizons’ identity and drive growth
proposal.clientOverview:
Green Horizons Landscapes Ltd. has quickly established itself as one of Scotland’s most ambitious and innovative landscape design consultancies. You’ve built a reputation for transforming public parks, urban green spaces, and private gardens with a unique blend of sustainability, creativity, and technical expertise. Your recent expansion into commercial contracts and public sector projects highlights your strong growth trajectory and the increasing recognition of your work.

As you look to the next phase of your journey, you’ve identified a need to bring cohesion and impact to your brand presence—both online and offline. With a diverse client base and growing team, you’re seeking a design partner who can help you articulate your values, tell your story, and create a visual identity as memorable as your projects.
proposal.problemAnalysis:
Despite your innovative portfolio and reputation for quality, your current branding lacks the consistency and punch needed to stand out in a competitive market. Your existing logo and marketing collateral feel dated and do not reflect your commitment to sustainability or your forward-thinking approach. You’ve also noticed that your brand messaging varies across touchpoints, making it harder for new prospects to quickly understand what sets you apart.

As you pursue larger contracts and more public-facing work, this lack of a unified, professional brand presence risks undermining your credibility. Internally, your team needs clear, practical brand guidelines to ensure every client interaction—whether a proposal, a newsletter, or a site sign—reinforces your values and expertise.
proposal.opportunitySection:
This is a pivotal moment to invest in a brand identity that captures the unique spirit and ambition of Green Horizons. By collaborating closely, we can craft a strategic, purpose-led brand that not only looks the part but also drives growth and deeper client engagement. Our approach is highly personal and pragmatic: we’ll work directly with your leadership and key team members to uncover your story, define your values, and translate them into a visual and verbal identity you can be proud of.

A refreshed brand will empower you to approach new markets with confidence, win higher-value contracts, and attract top talent. With clear, practical brand assets and ongoing support, your team can deliver a consistent, standout experience—whether you’re presenting to a city council or launching a community initiative.

recommendedServices.description: A hands-on session to clarify Green Horizons’ mission, values, and unique market position. We’ll uncover what makes you different and build a practical roadmap for your brand.

recommendedServices.name: Brand Identity Design

recommendedServices.name: Marketing Collateral & Case Study Templates
recommendedServices.description: We’ll create practical, beautifully designed templates for your key client-facing materials, making it easy for your team to share your best work and win new business.

recommendedServices.name: Ongoing Design Support
recommendedServices.description: Direct access to our creative director for ongoing tweaks, new collateral, and advice as your brand evolves.
